Frequently Asked Questions

We know you’ve got questions for us about everything from creating and publishing apps to effectively using categories to group your videos. We want you to know that we’re listening, so if you have a question that you need answered head over to the zype platform and click on the big question mark at the top right of your screen. That’s the best way to get in touch with us directly then we’ll start filling up this FAQ page with the most popular questions.
